snippet.title: PunchMan Online
snippet.description:
PunchMan is an online game designed for everyone who wants to enjoy their free time doing something funny.
Whether you're good or bad at gaming, whether you're a grown adult or child, your gender, your job doesn't matter. All you need to do is punch and punch.

■ Game Mode
There are two game modes in PunchMan online. Team Battle and Battle Royal.
Your teamwork will be tested in Team Battle.
You need to accumulate specific amounts of medals before your team can win the match. If you don't like it, you can be a lone wolf by playing Battle Royal mode and become the last one standing to win the game.

■ Ranking
Compete with all players around the world by collecting medals from each game you participated in. There's also a seasonal competition where you can participate and win some in-game items and titles.

■ Custom Character
You can customize your in-game character anytime, change your nickname, change your avatar, title, etc. You'll get more additional items and body parts by subscribing, completing the achievement, winning a competition, etc.

■ Friends, Clans, etc.
Though it is still imperfect, PunchMan allows you to make some friends, join or create a clan, send mail to your friend, etc. More features will be added sooner or later.

Please enjoy PunchMan online! 
We're looking forward to your in-game feedback, critics, etc.
Have a nice punch!

Available on Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.notebuddy.punchman

iOS coming soon!
